rules_text:
When Would-Be Hero dies, add two mana of any one color. Until your next end step, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Team [i](Cast either side or both. When you cast both, the back is a token.)[/i]
rules_text2: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text2: [i]It's no secret that listening to a Kerovotzian cat tends to end badly. But everyone thinks they'll be an exception.[/i]
